dict.acceptation: 揭露，揭发；使暴露；使遭受；使曝光；

sent.orig: After the expose he had to take it on the lam.
sent.trans: 事情曝光后，他不得不潜逃。

sent.orig: He studied the summer-resort posters, lest he have to acquaintances and expose his uneasiness.
sent.trans: 他仔细端详避署旅游的招贴画，免得见到熟人说话，露出他的不安。

sent.orig: Our Party's policy is not to refuse negotiations and in this way expose his deception.
sent.trans: 我党方针是不拒绝谈判，借以揭露其欺骗。

sent.orig: We should not expose our children to horrors.
sent.trans: 我们不应该让孩子看恐怖片。

sent.orig: We will expose the truth in the recent scandal involving the governor.
sent.trans: 我们会公布最近涉及总督的那件丑闻真相。
